search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Hnry (hnry.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Hnry is: [https://hnry.com/pricing/](https://hnry.com/pricing/) 【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Tax for Self-employed Medical Professionals - Hnry

extracted_content.content:
We charge 1% +GST of your self-employed income
----------------------------------------------

Capped at $1,500 +GST a year
----------------------------

We're your accountant, your software, and everything else.
----------------------------------------------------------

### And our fee covers it all.

Here's what you need to know:

*   Pay just 1% +GST from every payment into your Hnry Account.
*   Fee is capped at a maximum of $1,500 +GST per year.
*   It’s pay as you earn - no subscriptions, no obligations.
*   We automatically claim our fee as a business expense.
*   If you receive individual payments of under $50, a minimum fee of $0.50 +GST per payment applies.
*   See the [Hnry Service Agreement](https://hnry.co.nz/agreement/) for the list of all services included.

![Image 1: A phone screen detailing Hnry's fee structure: 1% +GST of your self-employed income, with coloured pie chart segments illustrating a payment breakdown. Icons on the side represent different professions, including design, filmmaking, and web development.](https://hnry.co.nz/processed-images/37d40809d596d8429f96dfefc3e5b92b.avif?_cchid=30acd18405b7974de24d06d3173472c7)

It's like comparing apples and fruit salad.
-------------------------------------------

![Image 2: Fruit Salad](https://hnry.co.nz/img/svg/fruit-salad.svg?_cchid=20a28a25a864cbf9a40310491296d8d2)

Why go out and pay for individual bits of fruit, when you can get it all (and all the extra good bits), for less?

We're not just your software, and we're not just your accountant. We're both and more, at the same time.

![Image 3](https://hnry.co.nz/img/svg/hnry-fruit-salad.svg?_cchid=19cb86e4f0914ce9b431abae3307d591)

#### 1% +GST

of your self-employed income, capped at $1,500 +GST per year.

#### Payment type

Only pay when you're earning self-employed income. No monthly subscriptions. No hidden fees.

#### What do we offer?

Hnry isn't just an accountant, or just software. It's both and more at the same time.

![Image 4](https://hnry.co.nz/img/svg/accounting-software-apple.svg?_cchid=dc0ccb41cc282e23b3b3a0b2916a5e3b)

#### $728 / yr.\*

on average.

#### Payment type

Subscription. Per month. Different plan options.

#### What do they offer?

Accounting software helps streamline your tax and business admin, and sets up your accountant for filing your tax returns.

![Image 5](https://hnry.co.nz/img/svg/accountants-banana.svg?_cchid=640ce73b55d6fc877db38067baf94801)

#### $1,920 / yr.\*

on average.

#### Payment type

Invoice after service.

#### What do they offer?

An accountant will use software to manage business finances and prepare accounts and tax returns.

\*Source: [The Hnry Sole Trader Pulse](https://hnry.co.nz/soletraderpulse), an independent survey of sole traders conducted by Resolve Strategic.

*   [Hnry](https://hnry.com/pricing/#hnry)
*   [Traditional accounting software](https://hnry.com/pricing/#software)
*   [Traditional accountants](https://hnry.com/pricing/#accountants)

*   The transition to being a contractor using Hnry was basically seamless. Hnry just makes everything so much easier.
    
    Alex Penney Self-employed builder
    
*   There’s no monthly subscriptions, you only pay when you’re earning. To me 1% of my income is nothing, I’d pay them 5% - it’s that good for me.
    
    Lauren Wooton Media Consultant
    
*   The transition to being a contractor using Hnry was basically seamless. Hnry just makes everything so much easier.

Go on, do it!
-------------

**Let Hnry sort your taxes, so you can focus on what you do best**

Hnry's simple and fair pricing means you only pay when you're earning, but you get UNLIMITED use of our service and team of expert local accountants.

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Hnry charges a percentage of self-employed income with a yearly cap, offering unlimited access to services.

pricing_tiers.tier_description: Pay as you earn model for self-employed individuals.
features: Taxes calculated and paid automatically as you earn
